name: Kluno: A Kid's Dream
description:
Swipe, Match, Win.

Every night, whilst others are fast asleep, Kluno dreams of exploring castles in the sky, and battling epic toy villains. With Squarrel, space explorer extraordinaire, recruit other heroes into your team and unravel the mysteries of Kluno's dream.

***

▶Features
[Unique Gameplay]
Experience a unique gameplay mix of puzzle matching and tower defense! Gain ammo by matching tiles and shoot down powerful enemies and villains with your heroes!

[Discover Heroes]
Discover and collect powerful heroes to assist you in battle! Each hero has a unique weapon and purpose; discover the best combination of heroes that suits your needs!

[Gachapon Monster]
Try your luck at the Gachapon Monster to win big! Collect and upgrade heroes with the prizes you win from the Gachapon Monster!

[Beautiful Art Style]
Witness a colourful illustrated art style throughout the game. Every character, environment and user interface element is carefully hand drawn by our amazing team of artists! Immerse yourself in the wild imagination of a child's mind!

[Massive Levels]
Explore over 450 levels to unravel the source of Kluno's recurring dream! Experience various game modes that keeps each individual level feel like a new experience!
